Hello All

We currently have 5 left of the current plans to allocate to new signups, we brought up a new server less then 48 hours ago and we have almost reached capacity.


    1GB guaranteed/1GB vSwap memory
    20GB RAID10 protected storage
    250GB/month data transfer @ 100mbit
    2 vCPU cores
    OpenVZ/SolusVM
    1 IPv4
    10 x IPv6
    Location: Manchester, UK

You're able to [signup here!](https://www.minivps.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=91)

Test IP (UK): 46.20.235.62

Do not hesitate to contact us if your have any questions or require further information, we can be reached at hello@minivps.co.uk
